abstract: A rift seems to be growing in Zuccotti Park, and a poll finds that a majority of Americans agree or mostly agree with the protesters.
snippet: A rift seems to be growing in Zuccotti Park, and a poll finds that a majority of Americans agree or mostly agree with the protesters.
lead_paragraph: Even within a square block, room for tension: a look at the geographical divide within Zuccotti Park between Occupy Wall Street's true believers on the east side and some less committed hangers-on and troublemakers on the west side. [Daily News]
